name: Rhythum
description:
Mobile suit/mech rhythm like game for the Arduboy.

You are piloting the Orchestra's new Rhythum mobile suit unit, when the ship you are on is attacked by a fleet of enemy suits known as the Conductors. Do you have what it takes to survive the Conductors' attack?

This game was developed during the fifth Arduboy game jam.

Download files require an Arduboy or device that can play Arduboy games.

More info about this game can be found here.

This game can also be played by downloading Felipe Manga's Arduboy Emulator and dragging and dropping in the hex file.

Banner art created by LENZ.

Like what I make. Consider donating to help me keep making games.
